text: Validate all user inputs to prevent SQL Injection.
Always enforce authentication and authorization on endpoints.
Use HTTPS for all API communications to protect sensitive data.
Rate limit endpoints to prevent abuse and DoS attacks.
Never expose internal IDs directly to clients to avoid IDOR.
Include guidance for secure file upload and virus scanning.
Specify minimum password strength requirements for user-related endpoints.
Include guidance for preventing user enumeration in authentication endpoints.
Validate all path and query parameters for type, length, and format before implementation.
Include guidance for secure versioning to prevent legacy endpoint vulnerabilities.
